result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Heather Marie Dashner in court with attorney Martin J Lipske.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 15CF146,15CF161,16CF206,17CF36,17Cf116. Atty comments rec'd offer from ADA and filled out PQ and will enter pleas of NC. CT has been provided a Offer to settle this is the agreement of all parties. Enters NC to each count. 15CF146 counts4-6 and , 15CF161, 16CF206, 17CF36 count 3 all DRI. Signed PQ. Understands elements of crimes. Admitts that the amount is greater then $2500. Def admitts, Wants Ct to accepts pleas of NC. Atty comments spent a lot of time hoping for a positive future. Def made some steps in handeling her temper.  - Ct accepts pleas and finds G. State complied with vic rights- no response from Mr. Peterson. did rec response from Sorenson. ADA comments prior record. Atty comments asking court to accept the offer- asking for huber. Son is with her mother, asking for child care release, working on medical conditions. Def apologies for actions. Ct orders -- see offer to settle--

STate comments talked to Nurse the requirements study supply of liquidsm checking to see if monitor would interfer. is approved by medical. or return on Monday. Pleas of NG are noted. Cash bail for a reason. CT orders $10,000 sign bond. All prev conditions remain in effect. can be released today after signs bond. Notify Ashland CO sheriff when she returns home for surgery and then she will go on monitor with 8pm -8am curfew. March 15, 2017 must make $50 payment., CANCELLED WARRANTS NOW  Status conference scheduled for April 10, 2017 at 01:45 pm.
